strategy

Interface IMastermindStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicStrategy, Knuth, Random, Simple

    public interface IMastermindStrategy
    Interface for a mastermind strategy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Code guess(Answer answer)
      Return the next guess determined by the number of correct buttons on the correct positions and number of correct buttons on the wrong positions of the answer.
      Code reset()
      Reset the state of the strategy, e.g. refill the set of possible codes.

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        Code reset()
        Reset the state of the strategy, e.g. refill the set of possible codes. Additionally, return the first guess (after the secret code has been found).
        Returns:
        First guess

      • guess

        Code guess(Answer answer)
        Return the next guess determined by the number of correct buttons on the correct positions and number of correct buttons on the wrong positions of the answer.
        Parameters:
        answer - Answer containing correct amount of buttons on correct positions and Correct amount of buttons on wrong positions
        Returns:
        Next guess
